column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went yesterday night with my coworkers and omg was this place amazing! The Brussels sprout salad
column4: the dates!!! .. everything we had was so delicious. I would def have to try a paella next time! This was the place I've only heard great things about
column5: and yesterday was my first time here. My new fav spot! Already planning on returning with some friends! Also the sangria was amazing. We tried like 3 flavors. And customer service was stellar!
